name: odbc_procedures
purpose: Get the list of procedures stored in a specific data source

return.description:
Returns an ODBC
   result identifier containing the information or FALSE on failure.The result set has the following columns:
   
    PROCEDURE_QUALIFIER
    PROCEDURE_OWNER
    PROCEDURE_NAME
    NUM_INPUT_PARAMS
    NUM_OUTPUT_PARAMS
    NUM_RESULT_SETS
    REMARKS
    PROCEDURE_TYPE
